author: gnodet
msg: Refactor the dispatching code a bit

author: hlship
msg: TAPESTRY-2239: The automatic ValueEncoder for Hibernate entities will sometimes encode an entity as null (rather than its primary key)

author: dkulp
msg: Start working on supporting the IBM 1.6 JDK
* Put javascripts tests to forkmode pertest to avoid some socket issues or other cleanup problems that are making the tests take about 15 minutes on IBM jdk
* Make the FaultBean generator create consistent beans so they are dependendent on which JDK generated them.
